full_summary:
======================
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title: HLVW - Spares - Miscellaneous

#### Solicitation Number: W8486-249471/A

#### Amendment Number: 6 (As of June 26, 2024)

#### Publication Date: May 1, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date: June 26, 2024, 14:00:00

#### Amendment Date: June 26, 2024

#### Expected Contract Start Date: July 19, 2024

#### Expected Contract End Date: October 21, 2024

#### Regions of Delivery: Montreal and Edmonton

#### Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence

#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the following miscellaneous spares. Delivery is requested to the following destinations:

* 25 Canadian Forces Supply Depot (25 CFSD), Montreal, Quebec
* 7 Canadian Forces Supply Depot (7 CFSD), Edmonton, Alberta

### Items to be Purchased

The following items are required:

1. **FILLER OPENING (RADIATOR CAP)** (30 units)
	* UNSPSC: 25174000
	* NSN: 21-9045403
	* Part No.: 990 12 53 0707
	* NCAGE: 2172N, S7622
	* Unit of Issue: Each
	* Destination: 25 CFSD, Montreal, Quebec
2. **LOCK ASSEMBLY** (15 units)
	* UNSPSC: 25170000
	* NSN: 21-9063846
	* Part No.: 160 00 11 0031
	* NCAGE: 0227N, F5610
	* Unit of Issue: Each
	* Destination: 25 CFSD, Montreal, Quebec

... (remaining items are listed in the same manner as above)

### Bidding Instructions

To submit a bid, please email your submission to DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca. 

### Debrieffings

The Department of National Defence will provide debriefings to bidders upon request.

### Important Notes

* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language
